10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated that:The Messenger of Allah said: "A Muslim man has no right to spend two nights while he has something to will, except while his will is recorded with him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْحَثِّ عَلَى الْوَصِيَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related That Encourages The Will
